title: Gamemodes
body:
When are we getting normal draft back?
When are we getting dominion?

If we can only have one normal game mode, can we replace blind pick with normal draft?
Why is blind pick favoured over normal draft anyway?

RITO PLS

replies.body: Normal draft is coming bois, they have to demo it for the new match making system. It might only stay for a few weeks though.

> When are we getting normal draft back?

Never. We're getting a new queue type akin to Teambuilder but using the draft pick style of "Draft Pick" to *replace* a queue we never had (and normal blind pick too, I think?). So far, it seems to be coming early next year.

> When are we getting dominion?

Literally 0 news on us getting Dominion. Ever. So "*soonâ„¢* ".

never and never

and blind pick is favoured because new users have 0 champs, so they wouldn't be able to play draft

So you obviously don't check the news. because normal draft is coming but dominion isn't at the moment

so its soon and never
